name: TheGinniShow
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A podcast series from media personality and comedian Ginni Saraswati. The Ginni Show is full of Curry, Comedy & Connectivity which invites listeners to follow the hilarious journey of the life of a young Sri Lankan immigrant woman growing up in Australia. Her podcast features weekly drops of Wisdom on Wednesday and her new feature – Monday Mocha, the podcast to start your week with that hit of coffee and inspiration with various guests and influencers around the world.
She talks about Joy, Wisdom, Self-Awareness, Self-Esteem, Empathy, Optimism, Gratitude, Patience, Love, Mindfulness, Meditation and Empowerment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
